dublin_core.dcvalue: A Case with isolated pain and swelling at the base of the left thumb is reported The problem had lasted for 2 years and it was getting worse with increasing pain also at the base of the right thumb The X ray showed a subluxation and an arthritis of the first CMCJ was diagnosed in left hand An excision arthroplasty was successfully carried out The excessive mobile phone use with active texting had been probably the main cause of the problem Many especially youngsters use their phones to text and play games a lot The purpose of this report is to make the researchers and practitioners aware of this problem and to encourage them to record these cases that may be common in future
Pathophysiology : the official journal of the International Society for Pathophysiology / ISP
Excessive texting in pathophysiology of first carpometacarpal joint arthritis.
